subject: All Star Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: While in Los Angeles for the All-Star Game, Dwyane Wade made some appearances, played some basketball and took a break from the whirlwind that is the Miami Heat’s regular season.
snippet: While in Los Angeles for the All-Star Game, Dwyane Wade made some appearances, played some basketball and took a break from the whirlwind that is the Miami Heat’s regular season.
